body: Love the art. The boyfriend as usual, smoll pp, wimpy attitude, a total loser. The rest is more of the same. Next chapter she becomes the ultimate bitch being gangbanged and getting fucked outdoors like an animal.

Tbh this artists plots (I mean the art is some thicc goodness if youre into it) are more fap fuel than anything to be fair. I don't think its really within expectations going to get a plot intended as a post fap read. This creator is fantastic for vanilla/ridiculous plots (Perverted moral committee member is some top shelf stuff imho that gets a few laughs).

@brucucked actually gets why a lot of people hate NTR. Repetitive dumb plots using the same 2-3 themes. Dumb/whore housewife/gf of dumb/naive husband/bf getting cucked by (insert generic person they interact with all the time with rapey tendencies) who ends up enjoying it. (Also all the retards tagging shit like regular cheating as "NTR" is hilarious).
I agree with @exknight. The plot should be the boyfriend cheating on the girlfriend so that the boyfriend receives the [rapist and] girlfriend's baby
This is pretty retarded, she's cheating on you and you want to give her a baby? What an idiotic premise author-kun
For what its worth.  Art is alright but I feel that this story was kinda dumb.. still good shit in the beginning but went down hill after that

These "blackmail gyaru-oh senpai/kouhai" format is kinda getting repetitive. I love ntr but if this doujin wants my approval then part 3 should be lit. I can't say revenge is possible, with that dick and that dialogue in the ending I'm seeing a potential cuck. Best ending would probably a bittersweet one where everybody except the gyaru-oh will get scarred. Anyways, art is good and all, just kinda asking "what's the difference?" with this following the footsteps of the likes of  Kanojo no Okashita Ayamachi(#289457) by Airi Socks, Seiso Kanojo, Ochiru(#295703) by Mosu, Zutto Shinjiteru (#296049) by Pija.
